patthana14.35:1.1: Niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.35:2.1: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana14.35:3.1: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana14.35:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
